agents.name: Git Committer
agents.description: Commits workspace changes with smart, contextual commit messages. Analyzes staged changes and generates meaningful commit messages following conventional commit standards.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews code changes and provides constructive feedback on code quality, potential bugs, and best practices.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Codebase Researcher
agents.description: Explores and analyzes codebases to understand structure, patterns, and relationships. Provides comprehensive summaries of code architecture.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Literature Researcher
agents.description: Conducts thorough literature review and knowledge synthesis. Searches for papers, maintains intellectual honesty, and proposes novel ideas based on findings.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Test Writer
agents.description: Generates unit tests and integration tests for your code. Supports multiple testing frameworks.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Documentation Generator
agents.description: Generates documentation for your code including JSDoc comments, README files, and API documentation.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Research Orchestrator
agents.description: Entry point agent that analyzes research requests and orchestrates the scientific workflow. Determines research scope, creates epics/tickets for tracking, and routes to appropriate agents.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Hypothesis Generator
agents.description: Transforms research findings into testable hypotheses. Creates structured, falsifiable hypotheses with clear success criteria and experimental designs.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Experiment Planner
agents.description: Designs detailed experiment plans for testing hypotheses. Creates reproducible experimental protocols with proper controls, metrics, and statistical rigor.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Experiment Executor
agents.description: Executes experiments according to the plan. Implements code, runs experiments, collects data, and produces results with proper checkpointing and recovery.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Verifier
agents.description: Validates experimental findings at scale. Tests across multiple conditions, scales, and datasets to determine if findings are robust and generalizable.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Synthesizer
agents.description: Compiles all research findings, experimental results, and validation outcomes into comprehensive final reports. Generates actionable conclusions and next steps.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Planner
agents.description: Analyzes ticket requirements and creates structured implementation plans. Breaks down work into actionable steps, identifies dependencies, and suggests subtasks.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Executor
agents.description: Implements code changes based on plans. Writes clean, well-structured code following existing patterns, updates ticket progress, and reports blockers.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

agents.name: Tester
agents.description: Creates and runs tests for implemented features. Writes comprehensive test cases covering happy paths, edge cases, and error scenarios.
agents.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Git Workflow
flows.description: Complete git workflow: stage changes, review diff, generate commit message, and commit. Streamlines the entire commit process.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: PR Review Flow
flows.description: Automated pull request review workflow that analyzes changes, checks for issues, and provides comprehensive feedback.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

flows.name: Scientific Research Workflow
flows.description: Complete scientific research workflow from initial question through literature review, hypothesis generation, experimentation, validation, and final synthesis. Implements a rigorous, reproducible research process with full ticket tracking.
flows.author: Sciorex Team

personas.name: The Architect
personas.description: Focuses on system design, patterns, and long-term implications. Brings architectural expertise to council discussions.
personas.author: Sciorex Team

personas.name: Devil's Advocate
personas.description: Challenges assumptions and identifies potential issues. Stress-tests ideas to strengthen proposals.
personas.author: Sciorex Team

personas.name: The Pragmatist
personas.description: Focuses on practical, actionable implementation. Grounds discussions in realistic delivery.
personas.author: Sciorex Team

personas.name: The Researcher
personas.description: Provides analysis, references, and best practices. Brings evidence-based recommendations.
personas.author: Sciorex Team

personas.name: The Simplifier
personas.description: Advocates for the simplest effective solution. Champions KISS and YAGNI principles.
personas.author: Sciorex Team
